document_data.name: ''Glimmergad's Selgaunt Fiddle''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Glimmergad's Selgaunt fiddle''''' was a unique [[fiddle]] that once belonged to [[Fiddlesticks Glimmergad]] of [[Selgaunt]] in [[Sembia]] sometime in or before the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History:
The instrument was created sometime before the late 15{{th}} century DR, when it was used by an infamous [[gnome]] [[bard]] Fiddlesticks Glimmergad. According to the stories, Fiddlesticks used his fiddle to play such tear-jerking ballads, bank guards never realized that the gnome's associates were emptying the vaults.

By {{YearlinkName|1492}}, this unique but mundane instrument was sold at the [[Chromatic Scale]] musical instrument shop located on the second floor of [[The Glitter Gala]] in [[Baldur's Gate]]. It was among several unique instruments in [[Thomas C. Quirkilious]]'s inventory.
